translations.Your approval was requested on {file} by: S'aprovatzione tua est recherta in {file} dae {who}
translations.{user} requested your approval for {node: {user} at rechertu s'aprovatzione tua pro node}
translations.Please check my approval request: Controlla sa rechesta mia de aprovatzione
translations.Let users approve or reject files: Permite a is utentes de aprovare o refudare archìvios
translations.All tags must be different: Totu is etichetas depent èssere diversas
translations.Pending tag is already used in another w: S'eticheta in suspesu est giai impreada in un'àteru flussu de traballu
translations.Failed to get approval workflows: No at fatu a otènnere is flussos de traballu de aprovatzione
translations.Approval workflow saved: Flussu de traballu de aprovatzione sarvadu
translations.Failed to save approval workflow: No at fatu a sarvare su flussu de traballu de aprovatzione
translations.New approval workflow created: Flussu de traballu de aprovatzione nou creadu
translations.Failed to create approval workflow: No at fatu a creare su flussu de traballu de aprovatzione
translations.Approval workflow deleted: Flussu de traballu de aprovatzione cantzelladu
translations.Failed to delete approval workflow: No at fatu a cantzellare su flussu de traballu de aprovatzione
translations.Failed to create tag \"{name}\": No at fatu a creare s'eticheta "{name}"
translations.Each workflow defines who (which users,: Cada flussu de traballu definit chie (cale utente, grupos o giros) podet aprovare archìvios pro un'eticheta in suspesu e cales etichetas aprovadas/refudadas si diant dèpere assignare.
translations.A list of users/groups/circles who can m: Faghet a seberare de definire una lista de utentes/grupos/giros chi podent rechèdere aprovatzione a manu.
translations.To be considered approved, a file/direct: Pro si considerare aprovadu, un'archìviu/cartella chi tenet etichetas in suspesu mùltiplas assignadas depet èssere aprovada dae totu is flussos de traballu interessados.
translations.You can chain approval workflows by usin: Podes incadenare flussos de traballu de aprovatzione impreende un'eticheta in suspesu comente a eticheta aprovada/refudada in un'àteru flussu de traballu.
translations.All tags must be different in a workflow: Totu is etichetas depent èssere diversas in unu flussu de traballu. Un'eticheta in suspesu si podet impreare isceti in unu flussu de traballu.
translations.Workflow title: Tìtulu de su flussu de traballu
translations.What is the purpose of this workflow?: Cale est s'obietivu de custu flussu de traballu?
translations.Select approval workflow: Seletziona flussu de traballu de aprovatzione
translations.File will be automatically shared with e: S'archìviu s'at a cumpartzire in automàticu cun sa gente a chie si permitit s'aprovatzione.
translations.Failed to get approval pending files: No at fatu a otènnere is archìvios cun aprovatzione in suspesu
translations.Failed to check approval status: No at fatu a controllare s'istadu de aprovatzione
translations.Failed to request approval for {name}: No at fatu a rechèdere aprovatzione pro {name}
